top_comments.comment: White Air Force 1 are played out. Everyone has of shoes now.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I can put up with the others but CHELSEA BOOTS AND FLANNEL SHOULD NOT BE ON THIS LIST
Thank you for referring a lace up boots 🥾 they have always looked more classic and damn good 😊.
I personally opt for some grey robes… matches my beard and hat.
I didn’t  see a single dude wearing Chelsea boots when I went out last weekend lol. Idk maybe it’s because I’m from dallas lol. We rock cowboy boots here . 🤠
